text: In the 2011–12 season, USM Blida is competing in the Ligue 2 for the 19th season, as well as the Algerian Cup. They will be competing in Ligue 2, and the Algerian Cup. ==Squad list== Players and squad numbers last updated on 30 April 2013 Note: Flags indicate national team as has been defined under FIFA eligibility rules.
